court: IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH CWP No.5352 of 1992(O&M) Date of Decision:01.03.2012 Raj Singh son of Dharamveer Singh, resident of village Kheri Sanwal (Bhiwani) Haryana. ... Petitioner Versus The State of Haryana through the Chief Secretary to Govt. Haryana, Haryana Civil Secretariat, Chandigarh and another. ... Respondents CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN Present: Mr. R.S. Sangwan, Advocate for the petitioner. Mr. Kshitij Sharma, AAG, Haryana, for the respondents. ***** . Whether reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment? NO . To be referred to the reporters or not? NO . Whether the judgment should be reported in the digest? NO K. KANNAN, J. (Oral) The counsel for the petitioner states that the relief has become infructuous and seeks for dismissal of the petition. Dismissed as infructuous. st March, 2012 ( K. KANNAN ) rajan JUDGE
